title: 'I have my own opinion' - Slot responds to Liverpool criticism
summary: Liverpool head coach Arne Slot admits he's aware of the "noise" around the club after just five wins in their past 18 Premier League matches, but refuses to define what an "acceptable" outcome to the season would look like to him.
